summary: All the categories have been redone such as crafting categories by type rather than material and names have been changed so they dont scream at you.
descriptionHtml:
Compatibility Notes:
----------------------------
It should work with everything.

General Notes:
-------------------
There are three items in immersive armours that cant be sorted atm and they are Redguard cape, Seadog cape and Seadog eyepatch so they will appear under Misc.

This is due to skyproc not having the biped slots i need so when skyproc is updated i will sort that out.

If you are using mods that have SPIKE.esm then add a rule to boss to sort Categories Redone.esm after it so that my mod sorts everything into the right category and you dont end up with weird things happening.

Thanks to everyone that endorses my mod.

Install:
---------
Pretty much straight forward, drop the esm into your Skyrim Data folder.

For the Compatibility patch drop the folder into your data folder, then go into the folder and run CRCompatibilityPatch.jar to make the patch.

Uninstall:
-------------
Like the install, just remove the esm.

Bugs:
-------
None that i know of.

Change Log:
-----------------
v1.3
------
Four new categories (Hats,Clothing,Gloves and Shoes) and an updated patch for better sorting.

Patch v1.2
---------------
With the new patch, Immersive Armors works properly with my mod so no more out of place categories lol. Clothing will appear under Misc until i finish sorting those. Enjoy.

v1.2
-----
Forgot to redo some of the labels so they were showing up as all caps, this fixes that.

v1.1
-----
Add two new categories "Arrows & Bolts" and "Staff" (Suggestion by ADragonCalledGeorge)

Credits
----------
Thanks to DienesToo and MongoMonk from the official skyproc thread for helping with the skyproc patcher code.
